metadata.name: Silence Speaks
metadata.description:
Communication, a bridge to the heart
Connecting souls, a vital part
Of our daily lives, a way to impart
Thoughts and feelings, a precious art.

With words we paint, pictures so bright
We laugh and we love, we express our plight
We learn and grow, with every sight
That we take in, in the world of light.

With every word, we have the power
To heal, to hurt, to build, to cower
So choose them wisely, in this hour
And let them bring us joy and flower.
